tool_description:
We provide sales tax calculation for your products or services in all US territories. 

For help, support or questions please contact us 
support@atomictax.com
name: Sales Tax Calculator
title: Sales Tax Calculator

api_list.name: Calculate Sales Tax
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sales-tax-calculator1.p.rapidapi.com/sales-tax"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sales-tax-calculator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
